dict.string: This app accesses your calendar to test EventKit functionality, including creating and reading calendar events.
This app accesses your reminders to test EventKit functionality, including creating and reading reminders.
This app accesses your contacts to test Contacts framework functionality, including reading contact information.
This app accesses your location to test CoreLocation functionality, including getting current location and geocoding.
This app accesses your location to test CoreLocation functionality, including getting current location and geocoding.
This app captures the screen to test screen recording and capture functionality.
